title: Learning: CNN in Tensorflow Coursera course
description: Trying to practice as I go through this course https://www.coursera.org/learn/convolutional-neural-networks-tensorflow/ Github repo for the course https://github.com/lmoroney/dlaicourse This tutorial helped with flow_from_dataframe https://medium.com/@vijayabhaskar96/tutorial-on-keras-flow-from-dataframe-1fd4493d237c I first tried cv2.imread from https://www.kaggle.com/abhishekrock/cat-dog-try Found an example of flow_from_dataframe on kaggle and it helped https://www.kaggle.com/takamichitoda/fine-tuning-vgg16
description_lemmatized: trying practice go course httpswwwcourseraorglearnconvolutionalneuralnetworkstensorflow github repo course httpsgithubcomlmoroneydlaicourse tutorial helped flow_from_dataframe httpsmediumcomvijayabhaskar96tutorialonkerasflowfromdataframe1fd4493d237c first tried cv2imread httpswwwkagglecomabhishekrockcatdogtry found example flow_from_dataframe kaggle helped httpswwwkagglecomtakamichitodafinetuningvgg16
